name: ACA2 Neo Geo: The King of Fighters '98
description:
" THE KING OF FIGHTERS '98" is a fighting game released by SNK in 1998.
In the previous installment KOF '97, the story of the "Orochi Saga" reached its exciting conclusion. As a result, the next entry in the series THE KING OF FIGHTERS '98 was released as a dream match version of THE KING OF FIGHTERS Series.
It is one of the most popular and well known versions of the game, partially thanks to the many balance changes that received high praisessss from fans around the world.

name: ActionCam: Supernatural Case
description:
Step into the shoes of a police officer investigating the mysterious disappearance of children. Enter the twisted world of a dangerous mind and uncover the truth.

See everything through a body camera. Every moment is recorded and later reviewed at the station to teach rookies how a real pro handles a case.

It feels real — the old, abandoned school, the dark corners, and hidden secrets. You can almost touch the worn walls and feel the cracks beneath your fingertips.

It’s terrifying — the madman is out there, lurking. Be careful with every step. Stay sharp. This place may look deserted, but it hides terrible secrets.

Pay close attention to the clues — they might lead you back to where it all began. Only you have the power to put an end to it. Open the door and step into the nightmare.

name: Pirate Trails
description: Arrr, hoist the sails and chart the course, for the gold won't bury itself!

name: Cat Spotting Challenge!
description:
Which One Is the Ragdoll?
A Relaxing & Brain-Training Game That’s Fun and Educational!

name: Vasterra
description: Enter the world of Helheim and build your village on a desolate island in the underworld of Norse mythology. Improve and maintain your village by gathering resources and defending it from enemy attacks. Can you thrive in the realm of the dead?

name: Sky End Market
description: Set up shelves, arrange products, and make your store bigger and bigger. Sell your goods to the remaining people, animals, and robots in the last place on earth just before the human race is exterminated.

name: Tale of Dark Lands
description: Tale of Dark Lands is a fantasy action RPG in a charming low-poly style with the spirit of an old fairy tale. A brave mercenary gets drawn into an ancient dark story that threatens the entire land. Develop your hero and fight dangerous enemies! Become a legend and stop the approaching darkness!

name: Defying the Shadows
description: Embark on a tactical roguelite adventure where you assemble your team of heroes to battle the Shadow army in turn-based combat. Test your strategy, adaptability and progress through the game to upgrade your characters and unlock new ones, shaping your ultimate squad for the battles ahead!

name: Mini Merchant
description: Saddle up your Caravan Demon and journey out to explore the Land Of The Ancient King! Explore beaches, meadows, tundra and desert to buy, sell, uncover and unlock items, and become the richest merchant in the land! A classic collect-a-thon adventure RPG, from Astrarium Games.

name: NecroWorld
description: NecroWorld is a RPG that takes place in the NecroCatic Games world with many unique characters, enemies, upgrades and collectibles!

name: Never Experiment On Cats!
description: The test cats have broken free! They're getting into all the equipment, from jetpacks to lawnmowers and paintball guns! Bounce, bash, and blast your way to the top of the scoreboard! Is there more to the lab? Who's behind it all? A family-friendly game you can play by yourself or with friends.

name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Heroes of the Past
description: Sin descripción

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - The Chapter of Marisa
description: Sin descripción

name: The Bodycam Shooter
description: Fast, tactical, and relentless—survive the fight.

name: Escape Game The Painting Mansion
description:
The orthodox escape game for you, staged in a rumored mansion.
Can you solve all the riddles and get out?

name: QUByte Classics: Glover
description: The classic 3D platforming adventure is back—better than ever! Roll, jump, and shape your journey in this hands-down ball-tastic adventure!

name: Blackbeard's Treasure
description:
Toss coins and rule the high seas!
Golden riches slumber on the treasure islands that await you!

name: ViCrew
description: A tactical RPG with turn-based combat in which you build a crew of Vikings to go on glorious raids.

name: Him, the Smile & Bloom Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Him, the Smile & Bloom: Additional scenario - Flower Halloween Night
description: Sin descripción

name: Cocktail Rush
description: Sin descripción

name: The Bad Parents
description: Sin descripción

name: Good Coffee, Great Coffee
description: Wake up and smell the coffee because TapBlaze's newest simulation cooking game, Good Coffee, Great Coffee, is finally here! Prepare delicious drinks, experiment with new flavors, decorate your shop, and manage cafe costs to become the best barista in town!

name: Railroads Online: Pioneer Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Freddy Farmer
description: Freddy Farmer is a retro arcade style game with 16-bit pixel art graphics in the style of the 80s/90s where you can test your skills as a player.

name: Okayu Nyumu!
description: An upcoming pure love visual novel made by ENTERGRAM and hololive's Nekomata Okayu.

name: Shift'n Slay
description: A brutal blend of turn-based tactics and roguelike. Take on the role of an executioner, grab crime by the throat with the hand of the law... and smash it! Because you are the law!

name: The Last Strand
description: The Last Strand is randomly generated twin stick shooter. You will play a pirate trying to escape a boat and seek vengeance, fighting enemies, helping NPC, discovering secrets and finding items.

name: Cladun X3
description:
The third numbered entry in the Cladun series.

Cladun X3 is a highly customizable and dynamic pixel art action RPG with a focus on hack-and-slash gameplay. Utilize a variety of weapons, magic, and actions to fend off the monsters monsters and traps that await you, and clear the dungeons!

name: Utawarerumono Trilogy Set
description: Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen, Utawarerumono: Mask of Deception and Utawarerumono: Mask of Truth together as the “Utawarerumono Trilogy Set”.

name: Darkest Mine
description: Darkest Mine is a roguelite action-plateformer with built-in co-op. Fight your way through monster-filled shadowy caves, take your pick from a large panel of abilities and weapons, adapt your choices, and create unique expeditions!

name: I Commissioned Some Butterflies 5
description: I paid artists to hide butterflies and flowers in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Early Days Collection
description: Yu-Gi-Oh! Early Days Collection is packed with classic Yu-Gi-Oh! games from the very early days of Dueling — bursting with retro RPGs and strategic card games with beloved anime characters!

name: All On Board!
description: All On Board! is a platform to play board games in VR with friends.

name: Cat Test Lab: Multiplayer Contest Arena
description: Create a spectacular cat and put it to the test in our competitive arenas! Play alone or with up to 7 friends to earn medals, discover secrets, and receive letters from adoring cat fans as your cat becomes more impressive and popular!"

name: Corporate Beatdown
description: You are the newest intern at SmashFest, a combat sports company with a violent corporate culture. Any office item can be a weapon. There is no HR department. The title of CEO awaits.

name: I am the Law
description: A brutal blend of turn-based tactics and roguelike. Take on the role of an executioner, grab crime by the throat with the hand of the law... and smash it! Because you are the law!

name: Fuyuzono Sacrifice
description: An otome game by Otomate.

name: Workshop Simulator VR
description: Become the atelier artisan you've always wanted to be. Take on restoration contracts, scale up your toolkit, and expand your workshop in the calming, immersive experience of Workshop Simulator VR.

name: Galactic Civilizations IV: Tales of the Arnor
description: Uncover ancient galaxy secrets in Galactic Civilizations IV's "Tales of the Arnor" expansion. Explore the lore of Mithilar and the Arnor, encountering relics and uncovering Precursor Wars history.

name: Kaiserpunk
description: Build and conquer in Kaiserpunk, the ultimate city builder and grand strategy combo set in an alternative 20th century world. Engage in epic battles on land, sea, and air, or use your economic power to emerge as the ultimate victor.

name: Faceminer
description: Faceminer is the dystopian narrative-driven A.I. management sim where you build a biometric data processing empire from scratch. Classify dubiously sourced data, upgrade mining infrastructure, and scale up your A.I. surveillance empire to obscene ends in this hardcore thriller clicker set in 1999.

name: Art is Rifle
description:
Unleashing the Chaos in Shooter Puzzle Genre!

Art is Rifle is an open-world, FPS puzzle game with rhythmic bullets and psychedelic art styles. Powered by Unreal Engine 5 and much passion.

Experience a psychedelic adventure through first-of-its-kind mind altering core gameplay mechanics, beyond visual and auditory designs!

Dive into a world of puzzles where tutorials are optional, and discovery is key! Your solutions, your style. Puzzles are your canvas, solve them your way!

Weaponize your art through a symbolic journey of cultural exploration.

The whole world is your drum kit!

Immerse yourself in a visually striking game that dances with a fusion of intense colors and mind-altering, psychedelic elements.

name: Strike Zero
description: In strike zero, you will play a girl who has lost her memory by integrating with the "Pi" fragment, and experience a series of unique adventures as a trainee pilot of the latest combat aircraft. You will find your memory in the crisis again and again and try to save the world.

name: Fishing Clicker
description: It is not easy to catch the best fish the first time. Being a good fisherman requires patience. Start with a small rod and worm. Fish and mysteries will earn you more money. Earn the chance to catch more mysterious and valuable fish with special fishing rods. You should choose your baits well.

name: Merc Storia - The Healer and the Melody of the Heart
description: Sin descripción

name: Story of Heterosexuality
description:
An artist's abstract attempt to articulate the experience of heterosexuality.

A segment from their artist statement: "What is heterosexuality? A preference? A biological trait? An orientation? A style of life? A philosophy? In my attempt to understand it, I have decided to make this game: Story of Heterosexuality. In so doing, I also wanted to feel what it is like to be a heterosexual and experience their struggles so as to become more empathetic with them, which makes this an 'empathy game'."

name: Sky Lanes
description:
Sky Lanes is an homage to the 90s MS-DOS arcade racing game Skyroads.
You race on straight courses, evade obstacles and jump onto different lanes.

The game supports ray-traced reflections and ambient occlusion, but it's not a requirement and can be disabled.

name: They Live in the Fractures
description: David finally finished his time machine and will be able to stop time and venture to the unknown realm of frozen time. But one should not go and play God.

name: Painted Legend: Knights of Ink & Paper
description: An action-adventure platformer in the metroidvania subgenre. The graphics are made in the style of a checkered notebook and blue ink. Defeat crowds of monsters, overcome traps, explore the game world, unlock new characters and find secrets! And all this to the accompaniment of driving music!

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Tales of Agrabah
description: The 15th free update for Disney Dreamlight Valley brings the new Aladdin Realm, the new characters Aladdin and Jasmine, four new Floating Islands, improvements for cooking and UI, custom size rooms and the Oasis Retreat Star Path.

name: Bakken: Ski Jumping 2025
description: Bakken 25 is a winter sports simulation game. Become a ski jumper and master every aspect of the discipline from the inrun to the outrun: the jumping, the flying and the landing! Are you ready for a new season?

name: DDinosaur with Double D's
description: DDinosaur has felt alone for millions of years now... Will she be able to find love without revealing her biggest secret? That she's a Dinosaur...with double D's.

name: R.E.P.O.
description: An online co-op horror game with up to 6 players. Locate valuable, fully physics-based objects and handle them with care as you retrieve and extract to satisfy your creator's desires.

name: The Stamp
description: Piece together your memories. Reveal the truth. A minimalistic Lovecraftian tale of symbols, sentences, and quiet discovery.

name: Crime Opera Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Rabbit Raid
description: Save your family by going on an adventure as a cute bunny.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Light Slips the Gate, Shadow Greets the Throne
description:
Version 3.1 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Tribbie and Mydei
• New Trailblaze Mission: "Light Slips the Gate, Shadow Greets the Throne"
• New areas: Grove of Epiphany and Janusopolis
• New Divergent Universe phase: Protean Hero
• …and more!

name: Crime Opera Fandisk: The Caterpillar Candids
description: Experience a special chapter in the ongoing mafia tale surrounding the infamous Gallos family!

name: Crime Opera II: The Floodgate Effect
description:
Experience a new chapter in the mafia tale surrounding the Gallos family! This story begins 9 years after the original. Xander Gallo is now bitter, alone and out of control. He’s causing problems for not only other families within the syndicate but also for younger Gallo members as well. Those who remained behind to continue the family legacy are soon forced to take sides with or against Xander Gallo, while others who have seemingly moved on with their lives are pulled back in against their will.

This is a tale of loyalty and deceit, murder and survival, as well as the strength or frailty of familial bonds. As a visual novel, Crime Opera II: The Floodgate Effect allows players the option of witnessing events in linear “kinetic” fashion or to affect how the narrative progresses by making key decisions along the way, all depicted with meticulously hand-drawn character portraits, a wide variety of scenes and scenarios to explore, original backgrounds and a soundtrack to fit the brooding and dangerous atmosphere.

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extra Pack feat. ASU
description: Sin descripción

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.9 feat. V.W.P
description: Sin descripción

name: Global Shipping Simulator
description: Dive into the fast-paced world of logistics and become the master of delivery. Manage your business, customize your space, and ensure every order is delivered on time. Can you build a delivery empire?

name: Cosmula
description: Engage in an intense space shooter that you can play singleplayer or multiplayer with up to six players. Play a variety of different spaceships, each with their own unique stats, components, and playstyles!

name: SGS Battle For: Dien Bien Phu
description: The emblematic siege battle of Dien Bien Phu that ended French rule over Indochina in 1954. Fight for the defense of the fortified camp or try to storm it, in order to reach the upcoming Geneva Peace Conference in a position of force.

name: Frogo Jump
description: Frogo Jump is a precision platformer with restricted movement. Play Frogo who can only jump his way out of wells he fell into.

name: Mills of Morris
description: Morris has long desired human life. He believes living as a human being is much better. Navigate through the Wizard’s puzzles and help him reach his goal in this pixel art sokoban, inspired by the classic Mills board game!

name: The Local
description: A fast-paced parkour game set in the Australian outback. Rail grind around the long abandoned country to complete orders or compete in timed courses. Master the movement mechanics and conquer the leaderboards.

name: Century of Anticipation
description: Locked away at home, time slows to a crawl, your only company is yourself. In this short adventure, your challenge might be the toughest of all: make time pass again!

name: BlueCloud Summit
description: BlueCloud Summit is a RPG roguelite deck builder game. The goal is simply to become strong enough to participate in and win a tournament of strength against the strongest people in the world. First you will need to become strong by exploring a diverse world to collect cards, weapons and relics.

name: InfiniPicross 3
description: InfiniPicross 3: The Conclusion of the InfiniPicross series! Faster and more complex procedural puzzles (as well as better looking), even more puzzles (IP 2.0 puzzles packed in), a smooth interface built on previous improvements, easy to tweak themes and a very easy built-in puzzle editor.

name: Fell
description: Fell is a 2d Precision Platformer with a retro 1-bit aesthetic. Play through multiple unique areas, unlock new color palettes, and use fun movement abilities to conquer levels and make difficult jumps!

name: Mortal Darkness
description: “One grim dawn and noble I wake, The darkness is rampant, our oath shall break. A noble warrior soon shall rise, and clear the air of the darkened skies.”

name: Starship Troopers: Extermination - Galactic Victory Edition
description: Squad up and fight for humanity's future in this 16-player online co-op FPS — and get bonus gear for your Trooper in the Galactic Victory Edition!

name: Deadside: Deluxe Pack
description: Includes Deadside base game, Supporter Pack DLC, flags set, and all skins.

name: Carte Blanche
description: Sin descripción

name: Minecraft: Nightmare Skin Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Lily & Sury: Adventures On Cristya
description:
Classic retro-style platform game. Help Lily or Sury save your friends from the evil Wuning through 8 worlds and 32 levels.

In this game you will find 32 challenging levels, find secret treasures, jump, crush your enemies and go through multiple obstacles, stairs, cliffs, spikes, various enemies and most importantly, save your companions from the hands of Wuning to prevent them from destroying the planet Cristya.

name: Company of Heroes 3: Fire & Steel
description:
Company of Heroes 3: Fire and Steel is a Battlegroup DLC pack consisting of four Battlegroups for Multiplayer and Co-Op/ skirmish vs AI.

US Forces – Heavy Weapons Battlegroup
Superior team weapons and halftracks control the battlefield before heavy armor arrives to finish the fight.

Requisition .50 cal heavy machine guns or off-map batteries of the devastating Black Dragon howitzer as part of Weapons Team support, or call in the Cavalry, with Assault half-track variants, 3-inch towed Anti-tank guns, and the implacable M26 Pershing heavy tank.

Wehrmacht – Terror Battlegroup
Shatter the enemy’s willpower with airstrikes, suppression and superior infantry tactics. Devastating heavy weapons will destroy anything that remains standing.

Use unorthodox Terror Tactics such as field interrogations, the Stuka’s iconic Jericho Trumpet, or V1 Rocket Strikes to force the enemy from the field, or show the enemy no quarter with Weapon Superiority and the King Tiger heavy tank.

British Forces – Canadian Shock Battlegroup
Seize territory to gain unparalleled momentum on the battlefield, and deploy powerful incendiary weapons to displace any who dare deny your movement.

Call upon Canadian Shock Sections and aggressive battlefield tactics to secure ground in a Shock Assault, or deny the enemy what they stubbornly refuse to cede with Incendiary Weapons, including the indefatigable Churchill Crocodile.

Afrikakorps – Panzerjäger Kommand Battlegroup
Cripple the enemy’s advance with defensive obstacles, enabling powerful anti-armor weapons to make the killing blow.

Use Stalling tactics, including Roadblocks, Minefields and Defensive Positions to buy the time you need to deploy your forces; elite Tank Busters and Tank Hunting tactics including the Elefant Tank Destroyer will crush even the strongest enemy armor.

name: This is Kiko
description: A long time ago, my younger sister and I lived together in a house by the sea.And then, one day—I remember meeting her.Was she a good person? I should have asked myself that question sooner."THIS IS KIKO" is an adventure game set in the modern era.

name: Only for Gamers
description: The game was designed for only Pro gamers. There are many hard obstacles in the game. You have to find a correct solution to overcome all the obstacles. However, It will not be as easy as you imagine.

name: RLChess
description: Dive into the ultimate chess showdown with RLChess! It's not just a board game; it's an epic battlefield where classic chess meets wild party antics. Get ready for a chess revolution that's packed with thrilling twists and lively interaction. Charge into RLChess and turn the chess world on its head!

name: Formula Rush
description: Formula Rush is a thrilling F1-inspired racing game! Race on real-world circuits, compete for the best lap times on global leaderboards, or challenge your friends in fun multiplayer races. With stunning graphics and regular updates, it's the ultimate racing experience on Steam!

name: Infinity Nikki: Eerie Season
description:
Miraland is under the spell of strange happenings—full moons lingering for days, Queen Philomi's Palace Ruins blooming with eerie purple flowers, and the once-mighty Bullquet now sluggish... Something dark lurks in the night. While most would steer clear of these eerie events near Queen Philomi's Palace Ruins, for brave adventurers, this is the perfect chance to seek thrills and uncover secrets.

From the forlorn ruins, a mysterious call echoes... Within the desolate relics, ghostly whispers resound. What hidden truth lies behind the legend? Only the full moon knows, her haunting melody carrying the weight of her sighs...

name: A Bibelot: Y-Break
description: Sin descripción

name: Cafemart Simulator
description: Create and decorate your cozy cafe, where guests can enjoy delicious food and drinks. Expand your service with a supermarket offering a wide selection of fresh products, so visitors can not only have a tasty meal but also do some shopping. Play solo or with friends in cooperative mode!

name: Xtris
description: XTRIS is an arcade dexterity game for the Playdate console. The goal is to catch as many Xs as possible within 60 seconds by moving around tetronimo-inspired game boards. The game currently features 3 levels, complete with stat tracking, leaderboards, achievements, and unlockable skins.

name: Shelldom
description: In Shelldom, snails worship alcohol—a drink they love but one that kills them. Their cults sacrifice their own for more, trapped in a doomed cycle. But legend speaks of the Holy Water, hidden atop a merciless tower. Can you climb, endure, and break the curse? Or will you fall like the rest?

name: The Backrooms: Forsaken
description: What would you do if you were trapped in a dimension of seemingly endless rooms that went on for eternity?

name: Life is Feudal: Arden
description: Life is Feudal: Arden is a new, free-to-play MMO set in a brutal medieval world. Challenge fellow feudal lords and ladies, and embark on a journey to conquer uncharted lands. Explore a meticulously hand-crafted map designed to cater to PvP enthusiasts, PvE adventurers, and even those who enjoy the thrill of PvPvE. Fight epic battles, forge alliances, master various professions, trade goods, craft unique items, and build thriving cities or impregnable fortresses. You are the sole driving force for your success!

name: Catastrophic Cat Command
description: Command thousands of cats on their journey to find a new home! Catastrophic Cat Command is an arcade-style game where you manage multiple mini-games at once! It’s the perfect game for a quick 5-minute break from work!

name: Ninja Five-O
description: Ninja Five-O allows players to relive this classic game. Uphold justice with fierce Ninjutsu moves on Steam.

name: Smashed
description: Play against your friends or players from around the world in rousing games ! One ball, two paddles, the goal is simple: Score as many goals as possible! For that, you will have to be reactive and strategic.

name: Red Lightning
description: A retro style, 2D top-down action/adventure game in the vein of NES archetypes. Couch style local co-op or solo.

name: The Little Brave
description:
Become a brave hero and embark to the dangerous journey though mysterious forbidden lands. Reveal secrets of the legendary past, find the last pieces of gone magic and gain courage to slay the terrible monster!

The Little Brave is a 2D action-adventure metroidvania genre video game about a little boy by the name of Keely. Get ready for an exciting adventure. Uncover the secrets of an old tale, gain bravery and strength on the path!

Keely lives in a world in which a long time ago there was magic. But one day a terrible curse distorted the magical places. Keely dreams to embark an adventure to discover the mystery of forbidden lands. Once fate gives him such a chance...

name: Time Hacker
description: Time Hacker is an addictive VR game where your creative ability is what gets you through the levels. Your only weapon is the power to stop time. That means, like Marvel's Quicksilver, you can enjoy playing with the scene while your enemies are effectively frozen.

name: SC Triple Cat Games Bundle
description: Cats with Guns + Super Astro Cats + Nefiriya and the Sand of Eternity

name: Ediction
description:
Raised from the dead, a man whose life was riddled with pain is made to consider what his last words will be once again.

Ediction is a visual novel made for the Love + Attraction Jam 2025. It is a complete story, sitting at around 23k words. Please note that it contains and discusses heavy themes, particularly suicide, but also death, abuse, and body horror.

name: Museum of All Things
description: Visit the Museum of All Things, a nearly-infinite virtual museum generated from Wikipedia! You can find exhibits on millions of topics, from the Architecture of Liverpool to Zoroastrianism. Search for the topic you want to learn about, or just wander from topic to topic as your curiosity dictates!

name: Spring in Her Step
description: Sin descripción

name: Stratogun
description: Stratogun is an ultra-fast orbital arcade space shooter where a fraction of a second will decide whether you live or die. Do you have what it takes to survive on the orbit? Play the demo and find out.

name: Wild Willy West
description: Wild Willy West is a western top-down shoot 'em up, featuring action packed levels and instant death combat. Use an arsenal of magical bullets to blast your way through the old west, and take revenge on those who wronged you.

name: Balatro: Friends of Jimbo 4
description: Customise your decks with stunning new cosmetic card skins featuring fan-favourite characters like Vault Boy, Ezio Auditore da Firenze, Percival Fredrickstein von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III and more!

name: Sayonara Wild Hearts
description:
Sayonara Wild Hearts is a dreamy arcade game about riding motorcycles, skateboarding, dance battling, shooting lasers, wielding swords, and breaking hearts at 200 mph. Now available on PlayStation 5 with a brand-new exclusive unlockable game mode, the Remix Arcade.

In the new PlayStation 5-exclusive Remix Arcade mode, speed through infinitely replayable levels and chase high scores in random sound bites, all with no loading. Sayonara Wild Hearts now features stunning 4K resolution, 120 FPS, and haptic feedback through the DualSense controller, delivering pulse-pounding, immersive action.

name: One Minute
description: Dive into the frantic universe of One Minute, a roguelite game like no other where every second counts! Designed to be fast, accessible, and addictive, this game offers an intense experience entirely controlled with your mouse.

name: Lumi Trek
description: Lumi Trek is a unique rhythm platformer where you have to combine the three primary colors of light to overcome obstacles. Change the color of the moving star at the right time, and stay calm when deadly traps appear. It may sound simple, but this challenge will make your hands sweat!

name: Wish Ready Go!
description: “Wish Ready GO!” is a game combines visual novel, simulation and role-playing. In the game, players will role as an goddess candidate, who need to pass the final exam to be a real goddess. Make your choices carefully, and help the heroine to finish her tasks!

name: The Dark
description: It's a small psychological horror game where the player takes on the role of a blonde man trying to escape a mysterious villa, and as the process progresses, he will wake up from a dream he has already done 16 times ......

name: Unprotected
description: A perverted scientist wants to immortalize the human race and reduce the total human population. While trying to uncover this secret in the game, force the scientist to correct his mistakes!

name: Sparta 2035
description: "Sparta 2035" is a turn-based tactics game in the spirit of a classic action movie. Control a squad of mercenaries, complete missions and liberate Africa from terrorists.

name: Endeavor
description:
Endeavor is a 3D Space Adventure.
Explore, investigate, gather, build and battle your way through the unknown frontiers of infinite space-time.

name: Naughty Tales of Rabbits: A Cuckold RPG
description: A whimsical RPG adventure where a loving couple must vanquish the four Elemental Demon Lords! There's just one problem- the girlfriend is lusted after by the denizens of this realm, and the boyfriend has a huge cuckold fetish!

name: Dirok
description:
Dîrok is a unique game. First because it is the first game that combines four in a row with deck building and second because it is the first turn-based game in real time.

That means that while you are on your turn to make your move, things continue to happen on the board. This raises a new level of strategy never seen before.

In addition, the game has more than 100 real historical figures with which to form your deck and all of them will have a bio that will help us better understand who they were.

As if that were not enough, the characters will have different levels of strength, defense, life and dodge, in addition to having unique positive skills for allies and/or negative ones for enemies, thus being able to change the dynamics of the game at any time.

name: Dualikiwi
description: Dualikiwi is a puzzle game in which your enemies mirror your movements. Your evil clones are stronger than you - use your environment to defeat them and emerge victorious!

In this 2D pixel RPG, 24 navigate battles, puzzles, and quests in a war-torn world devoid of color. Your choices dictate the non-linear plot, with multiple endings and an open world hanging in the balance. Will you bring back color as the savior or succumb to darkness?

name: Cats Hidden in Japan
description: Find 100 cats hiding in Japan in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Fortune & Famine
description: In this tabletop strategy game you play as the ruler of a fantasy kingdom on the brink of a long winter. You compete against neighboring rulers to gather the best workers and stockpile the most resources in the land.

name: I Just Want to Be Single!!
description: I Just Want To Be Single!! is a visual novel dating simulation game where the twist is that you do not want to date the cast of eligible bachelorettes. In the game, you play as Aya, a socially awkward girl in her second year of high school, who only wants to make friends. Unfortunately, being a new transfer student starts turning heads and gets the attention of everyone in her class.

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow - Silver Edition
description: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: DexSweeper
description: A minesweeper-type game where the cursor never stops moving. Use the Playdate's crank to guide your movement, then time your tile reveals carefully. One wrong move could be your last.

name: Gomiboru
description: Sin descripción

name: Mangui
description: Mangui is a turn-based roguelike game inspired by spooky traditional Korean folklore. Play as one of four protagonists, unraveling the mysteries of the dark Mangui mountains. Live to tell the tale in this dangerous world filled with ghouls and monsters!

name: Supernatural: The Game
description:
Supernatural: The Game. The game will consist of 5 parts, 1 part will tell the story from the childhood of the Winchester brothers and their first encounter with the supernatural. The remaining parts will tell the story of Dean Winchester's development as an independent hunter of evil spirits.

In the Ten Towns of Icewind Dale, the Hero of Neverwinter awakens. Stripped of their recent memories and left to die by a mysterious power, they must survive a dire threat to the dale as they seek the truth behind their abduction. The answers they discover will shape the very fate of the Forgotten Realms.

name: Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii - Deluxe Edition
description:
■PIRATE YAKUZA ADVENTURE AHOY!
Goro Majima, a notorious ex-yakuza suddenly finds himself shipwrecked on a remote island in the Pacific. Unable to remember even his own name, he sets sail in search of clues to his lost memories, accompanied by a boy named Noah who saved his life. Before long, they’re caught up in a conflict between cutthroat criminals, modern-day pirates, and other scoundrels over a legendary treasure.

■GET YOUR SHIP TOGETHER
Assemble a one-of-a-kind crew while upgrading your ship as you explore the open sea and forge your legend in the cannon fire of foes, unexpected friendships, and immense riches made along the way.

When an enemy pirate ship catches you in their sights, an exhilarating real-time cannon battle breaks out. Quickly maneuver into position while avoiding fire, then deliver devastating damage to board the enemy ship and take down the captain in all-out crew vs. crew brawls. Conquer the seas, discover hidden islands and acquire loads of loot like a true yakuza pirate!

■KICK ARRRSS WITH CREATIVE COMBAT
Dynamically switch between the “Mad Dog” and “Pirate” fighting styles to mix-up attacks and deliver explosive combos, juggles, and aerial takedowns that reward your creativity with over-the-top action.

With “Mad Dog” style, utilize speed, agility, and flair to deliver precise yet powerful blows that stun your enemies into submission.

Or make enemies walk the plank with the “Pirate” style that has you dual-wielding short swords and deploying tricky pirate tools to kick some serious booty.

*This product contains the base game and add-on content. Please be aware that the additional content is also sold separately.
*The “Legendary Pirate Crew Pack” will be available after the main character's pirate ship upgrade event in Chapter 2 of the main game.
*The “Legendary Outfit Pack” will be available after the ability to change outfits is unlocked in Chapter 2 of the main game.
*The “Ship Customization Pack” will be available after the main character's pirate ship upgrade event in Chapter 2 of the main game.
*The “Extra Karaoke & CD Pack” will be available after gaining access to a smartphone in Chapter 1 of the main game.
*The contents of the "Legendary Pirate Crew Pack", "Legendary Outfit Pack", "Ship Special Customization Pack" & "Additional Karaoke & BGM Pack" will not be counted toward in-game achievements.

name: Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii - Collector's Edition
description:
A new legend begins as you step into the steel toe boots of Goro Majima, a man who has lost his memory and reinvents himself as a pirate on the open sea.

Embark on an over-the-top, modern-day pirate adventure with an ex-yakuza, now pirate captain and his crew as they engage in exhilarating combat on land and sea in the hunt for lost memories and a legendary treasure.

name: Slavic Winter Simulator
description: Slavic Winter Simulator is an authentic experience that recreates the celebration of New Year among residents of the post-Soviet space in the 2000s, offering nostalgic emotions. Throw snowballs at your in-game friends, enjoy the magical atmosphere of New Year from the 2000s, and relive the carefree days of childhood.

name: Dungeonfell
description:
Enter the World of Dungeonfell,

A tactical team-based Roguelite where you lead a group of heroes into ever-changing dungeons. Battle against hordes of Monsters and uncover the corruption lurking deep within the dungeon’s heart.

Learn the unique abilities of each Hero and unlock new spells and skills as you progress. Combine your heroes strategically to create powerful synergies and overcome the increasingly difficult enemies you face.

name: A Tower's Will
description: A Tower’s Will is a 3D platform game where you have to climb a sentient tower that doesn’t want to be climbed. Will you rise victorious or tumble down in defeat?

name: Garten of Banban 0
description: Explore the origins of the mysterious Banban’s Kindergarten. Survive the dark past of the establishment. Try to make some friends. Uncover the truth behind the place, and who you are

name: Port Town: Survival
description: A deserted port town, missing people, and a dark secret waiting to be uncovered… Dive into Port Town’s open world, collect mysterious photos, and reveal the truth. But be careful… some secrets are meant to stay buried.

name: Re:Fragment - Absolute Ambition
description: We all dream of a bright future ahead, but life doesn't always turn out how we expect. Yuuma, the protagonist, lives a peaceful life until the student council president proposes a new controversial policy that changes everything they once knew forever.

Embark on an over-the-top, modern-day pirate adventure with an ex-yakuza, now pirate captain and his crew as they engage in exhilarating combat on land and sea in the hunt for lost memories and a legendary treasure.

name: Tortuga City
description: Survive Tortuga City as a wanted turtle. Defend yourself against the police, build a rebellion, endure dynamic weather, and find an escape route within 50 days before the police deploy their secret weapon.

name: Storage Looter
description: Storage Looter is a loot game in a Voxel universe. Your goal is to collect the rarest and most profitable items in order to improve your store. From classic recovery to a metal detector, there are many things to do!

name: Slime Clicker
description: Bright adventure in the world of slimes with RPG elements! Battle bosses, dive into minigames, level up your character, and unlock unique weapons. Wishlist now!

description: Prepare for an endless onslaught of the undead in Mortalis Meltdown, a heart-pounding, action-packed top-down zombie shooter! Embrace the thrill of survival as you face wave after wave of relentless zombies, their numbers growing ever larger and their hunger for flesh never-ending.

name: Dolmenjord: Viking Islands
description: Arrange the Viking villages in the islands to expand their domains, in this logic puzzle game! After years of battles, a group of Vikings decided to conquer new lands. Under the protection of the god Njord, a new clan sets out in search of glory!

Harvest their guts for scrap and earn a deliciously varied array of upgrades. Beat the last wave if you have the skill, then strap in and try again in this survival roguelite shooter.

Deal with enemies by combining powerful dice on your board, boost their effects with magical relics, and risk it all hoping for a good roll on unexpected encounters.

description: The underwater shoot ‘em up from game developer Rainbow Arts is finally returning in a faithful remake completely rebuilt from the ground up and greatly improved. The sprite work of yesteryear has not only been remade into modern high-resolution sprites but also expanded with particle and lighting effects.

name: BrokenLore: Low
description: Low, a first-person Horror Game, immerses players in the dark prelude of BrokenLore's story. Set in a mist-shrouded Japanese village, players uncover deep-seated hatred and ancient secrets. Navigate a hyperrealistic, claustrophobic environment where supernatural forces and tragic cycles abound.

name: Blood Typers

Choose from a roster of characters then plan your escape from this bloody homage to old school horror. But remember... death is just a typo away.

name: Patriotika RPG: Shadow World

name: Card Toons
description: Battle against toons in this cartoony roguelike deckbuilder where each run is different. Improve your deck with various creatures and spells, collect powerful relics, and defeat your enemies to win the Card Toons game show!

name: LlamaRPG: Farm to Fable
description: A turn-based combat RPG following a llama traveling around the world trying to be a hero. Full of great itemization, crafting, story, hat collecting, and more.

name: The Well of Essenwood

Each begins their own adventure, and eventually unite to unravel a sinister plot to seize the magical well in the Essenwoods, which contains the very essence of magic in the land.

name: Fledglings

name: Era One

Players can create and customize their bases from scratch, construct various types of structures and warships, manage fleets, and engage in tactical space battles.

name: Cabernet
description: Cabernet is a 2D narrative RPG set in 19th century Eastern Europe. Guide Liza, a young vampire struggling with her morality and the supernatural world she has been pulled into. Beware, the taste of Cabernet is not for the faint of heart - prepare to explore themes of social conflict, alcoholism, and corruption.

name: Japanese Drift Master
description: Welcome to Japan, the drift capital of the world! Compete, drift, and race on miles of varied roads and winding mountain trails. Drive through towns nestled at the scenic Haikama Lake. Spend your savings on new cars and get a taste of Japanese tuning style.
